channel.title: Omfg saving help!
channel.description: Whenever i play mopar, it says registering account Saturated5 iwht passs whatever. after i log out it says "Saved game for Saturated5" after i log in after closing mopar(yes this is with the downloaded version) it says its registering me AGAIN!!!!! AFTER I JUST SAVED THE GAME!!!! can sum 1 tell me how to save a mopar account permanaantly???

item.title: Omfg saving help!
item.dc:creator: @Saturated5 Saturated5
item.description:
@Saturated5 wrote:

Whenever i play mopar, it says registering account Saturated5 iwht passs whatever. after i log out it says “Saved game for Saturated5” after i log in after closing mopar(yes this is with the downloaded version) it says its registering me AGAIN!!! AFTER I JUST SAVED THE GAME!!! can sum 1 tell me how to save a mopar account permanaantly???
